title: chroma i jsut bought didnt show up
body: so i bought the puppy nasus icon + golden revel token bundle and then bought the Katarina chroma but it doesnt show up on kata in game loby

replies.body: It's not in your loot as a shard?

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=01UWeFUK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-10T03:26:26.917+0000)
>
> It's not in your loot as a shard?

no its not there

You own Warring Kingdoms Kat yeah?

Assuming yes, I'd recommend submitting a ticket to Player Support since they can take a look behind the scenes and see what went wrong with the transaction.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
it says i have to login when im already login

Try logging out of boards then into the support site. I don't know if that's still an issue but it has been in the past that there would be a conflict there.

If that doesn't work try clearing your browser cache before logging in. (If you use Chrome, 3 dots top right > More Tools > Clear Browsing Data > Cached Images and Files + Cookies)
